decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to utilize cards like Dark Ritual, Songs of the Damned, and Cabal Ritual to generate large amounts of mana quickly, allowing the player to cast multiple spells in one turn. The combo aspect comes from using Reaping the Graves to return creatures from the graveyard to the battlefield, creating a powerful board presence. The deck includes cycling cards like Street Wraith and Architects of Will to help dig for combo pieces and maintain card advantage. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a quick and powerful creature presence.

This deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence with efficient artifact creatures and utilizing cards like Candy Trail and Ichor Wellspring for card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of artifacts and creature spells, while also disrupting their strategy with cards like Nihil Spellbomb and Galvanic Blast. The deck's synergy with artifacts and the affinity mechanic allows for explosive plays and a fast clock on the opponent. The deck also includes removal spells like Cast Down to deal with opposing threats and maintain board control.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana using cards like Arbor Elf and Utopia Sprawl to play powerful creatures like Annoyed Altisaur and Avenging Hunter. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early aggressive creatures while also disrupting their strategy with cards like Malevolent Rumble and Eldrazi Repurposer. With a mix of efficient ramp and powerful threats, this deck aims to take control of the board and quickly defeat the opponent before they can establish their own game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm opponents with a swarm of low-cost creatures, utilizing cards like Kor Skyfisher and Lunarch Veteran to maintain board presence. Support cards such as Prismatic Strands and Guardians' Pledge help protect and buff the army of weenies, while cards like Militia Bugler and Thraben Inspector provide card advantage and utility. The goal is to quickly flood the board with creatures and maintain pressure on the opponent, ultimately leading to a fast and aggressive victory.
